channel.title: How to create decals in HL2/Any other Source game?
channel.description:
Hello there. I've always wondered how one might go about creating decals for Half-Life 2 or any other of it's Source counterparts in Photoshop.
Anyone have a tutorial for me, or be willing to make one for me?
Thanks dudes.

item.title: How to create decals in HL2/Any other Source game?
item.dc:creator: Collision
item.description:
Should make a sticky with a direct link to it saying.

‘Read this entire site first, if that doesnt help, then post here.’

Read full topic
item.source: How to create decals in HL2/Any other Source game?
